data.convo: I am thinking about resigning from my current job . Have you thought about it seriously ? Yes , I have been thinking about it for quite a while . Now I finally make up my mind to leave . I have given my resignation letter to our boss last Friday . Ok , did you find a new company ? Yes , I will move on to XYZ Company . Good for you , but your leaving will be a great loss to us . It is so nice to work with you . Thanks . I had learned so much from you and our colleagues .
